feed.title: Brackets Extensions Weekly
feed.subtitle: New and updated stuff to improve your Brackets experience

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/22
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/22.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 05/18/2015 to 05/25/2015.

Last week there were 8 new Extensions and 16 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m late, late, late and still catching up with the previous weeks. Too much things going on at the same time. New projects and maintenance of old projects :-)

One important update: there is a new way to get in contact with the team. We have created a Slack Channel where you can ask questions about Brackets and talk about features.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Extract for Brackets (Preview) 9612 ⇔
2 Brackets Git 5104 #3 ⇑
3 Emmet 4670 #2 ⇓
4 Beautify 3786 ⇔
5 PHP SmartHints 2436 #7 ⇑
6 Brackets Snippets (by edc) 2055 ☼ ☼
7 Extensions Rating 2007 ☼
8 Open In Browser 1996 #6 ⇓
9 Pop-up Menu Brackets 1994 #11 ⇑
10 W3CValidation 1920 #5 ⇓
11 JSCS for Brackets 1784 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Monokai Dark Soda 1560 ⇔
2 mannari 879 #11 ⇑
3 Theme / Spring Light 846 #7 ⇑
4 Neon 729 #2 ⇓ #2 ⇓
5 Solarized Dark 685 #3 ⇓
6 Quick Dark 553 #4 ⇓
7 DarkSoda 472 #6 ⇓
8 Monokai 433 ☼
9 Ariane 367 ⇔
10 Rolando Zabala II’s Dark Theme 332 ☼
11 Quick Light 315 ☼

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Lucee 0.1.1 Lucee Support for Brackets.
Bộ gõ Tiếng Việt Mudim 0.9.0 Trên Linux khi gõ Tiếng Việt thông qua các bộ gõ như IBus, nó sẽ không trực tiếp nhúng ký tự ngay khi ta gõ. Chính vì thế chức năng autocomplete trong Brackets sẽ không hoạt động như mong đợi. Extension Bộ gõ Tiếng Việt Mudim sẽ giúp khắc phục vấn đề đó. Lưu ý: Tắt bộ gõ Tiếng Việt trên máy khi dùng extension này.
Bộ gõ Tiếng Việt AVIM 0.9.0 Hỗ trợ gõ Tiếng Việt trong Brackets, không bị lỗi chức năng Autocomplete khi dùng trên Linux. Lưu ý: Tắt bộ gõ Tiếng Việt trên máy (ví dụ: ibus-unikey) khi dùng extension này.
Sand 1.0.0 A desert inspired theme for Brackets
Neon Highway 1.0.0 A neon theme for Brackets
Rolando Zabala II’s Dark Theme 1.0.0 A dark theme based on Brackets Default Dark Theme template
DarkPanja 1.0.0 A Dark Theme By Panja
Proper Indent 0.1.0 Hack on multiple diverse projects at the same time? Each using different indent? This extension will save you a lot of time switching your Brackets indent settings.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Brackets Git 0.14.27 Integration of Git into Brackets
Autosave Files on Window Blur 1.0.6 Autosave all open files when switching applications, in the style of PHPStorm/WebStorm.
QuickDocsJS 1.6.6 Inline short documentation for JavaScript functions, including a summary,syntax and parameters. Docs for jQuery,NodeJS and some basic ReactJS functions.
Preferences setup UI 1.2.0 Form for editing preferences.
JSCS for Brackets 0.7.0 Adds JSCS support to Brackets. JSCS is a code style linter for programmatically enforcing your style guide. You can configure JSCS for your project in detail using over 120 validation rules.
ECO template syntax highlighting 1.0.2 Add syntax highlighting support for the Eco templating language (.eco).
Extensions Rating 0.7.0 Shows extension’s download count(daily, overall, average and per version) and GitHub stats(stars and forks). Find most usable and popular extensions for Brackets via badges system! Sort extensions and find themes!
Documents Toolbar 0.5.15 Adds toolbar with tabs of open documents on the top of the editor. Now with split view support!
Slack Snippet 0.3.1 Push code snippets to a slack channel
Brackets Editor Bookmarks 0.10.4 Bookmark lines in the editor as you work so you can quickly jump back to them later. Open the “Bookmarks” Panel to see all of the bookmarks and open them in the editor.
PHP SmartHints 1.2.0 Provides code hints for PHP files including PHP keywords, built-in functions, constants and variables. Also provides hinting for variables in the current open PHP document. Note that this is a continuation of the former [PHP-SIG] Brackets-PHP-SmartHints and not a new extension or fork. The Brackets Registry flags it as a new extension if you change the name (makes sense).
Geekowater 0.1.1 Tema Geeko basado en la guía de estilo de Peter Gabriel’s Debut Album en TheDaysColor.
Go to Matching Bracket 2.1.0 Instantly locate and place the cursor on the matching bracket to the one under the cursor. Simply place the cursor on any one of {, }, (, ), [ or ] then press CTRL-ALT-RIGHT (CMD-ALT-RIGHT on Mac) or use the ‘Navigate… Go to Matching Bracket’ menu item to locate and place the cursor on the matching opening or closing bracket. NOTE: v2.0.0 changed the hotkey for compatibility with Brackets 1.3.
Pop-up Menu Brackets 2.2.2 A Brackets extension that add additional functionality to Brackets editor right menu like cut, copy, paste, save all, Camel Case, UPPERCASE, lowercase and some functionality from edit menu.
UI too small 0.0.4 Increase font sizes for people working on high dpi displays on Linux
M4 Macro Syntax Highlighter 0.1.1 Simple Syntax highlighting for M4 Macro files (e.g. Autoconf). To improve editting of configure.ac files primarily.

entry.title: Weekly Brackets Extension Update - 15/21
entry.content:
Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/21.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 05/11/2015 to 05/18/2015.

Last week there were 3 new Extensions and 13 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m late, late, late and still catching up with the previous weeks. Too much things going on at the same time. New projects and maintenance of old projects :-)

One important update: there is a new way to get in contact with the team. We have created a Slack Channel where you can ask questions about Brackets and talk about features.

Have a great week!

In the meantime, you can find us on these social networks

  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • twitter
  • Slack Channel

Share your thoughts and stories, ask questions and get in touch with the team.

As usual, you can download the latest Brackets release. Please let us know what you think.

Top 11 Extension Downloads of last week

Find an overview of extensions that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Extract for Brackets (Preview) 16765 ☼
2 Emmet 4481 ⇔
3 Brackets Git 3676 #1 ⇓
4 Beautify 3494 #3 ⇓
5 W3CValidation 3305 #11 ⇑
6 Open In Browser 2697 ☼
7 PHP SmartHints 2561 #9 ⇑
8 HTML Templates 2176 #7 ⇓
9 Brackets Icons 1793 #6 ⇓
10 Autoprefixer 1570 #4 ⇓
11 Pop-up Menu Brackets 1428 ☼

Top 11 Theme Downloads of last week

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week
1 Monokai Dark Soda 2067 ⇔
2 Neon 1569 #6 ⇑
3 Solarized Dark 1166 ☼
4 Quick Dark 807 #2 ⇓
5 Pretty Light Theme (for Brackets) 544 ☼
6 DarkSoda 534 #5 ⇓
7 Theme / Spring Light 518 ☼
8 Neptune 473 ☼
9 Ariane 436 ☼
10 Ant Theme 425 #3 ⇓
11 mannari 415 ☼

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Resize Working Files 1.7.0 Brackets extensions to allow the user to resize the Working Files pane.
Pretty Light Theme (for Brackets) 1.0.0 A Pretty Light theme for Brackets, by MMK Jony. This theme is designed with some pretty color-scheme to make your code-editor much eye-friendly and readable.
mannari 1.0.0 A phantom color scheme for Brackets.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
CodeIgniter Translate 0.0.13 Tool to help translate CodeIgniter template, works with PHP and Smarty. Automatically places the string into languages files and replaces it by a key. Allows modifying the translations from the template.
Brackets Bower 0.2.10 Manage your application’s front-end dependencies using Bower. You can install and prune dependencies using the bower.json file and configure Bower through .bowerrc. Also, quickly install front-end packages by hitting Ctrl/Cmd-Alt-B, then start typing the name of a package. Once you see the package you want, hit Enter and the package will be installed into your project folder. NOTE: To install some packages, you must have Git installed.
JSLint Configurator 1.1.12 Enables configuration of JSLint options. Extract JSLint options to JSON.
BracketstoIX 3.2.0 [3.0]Execute,Lorem ipsum, Break Line, Recent Files.Change(Case, Quote, Slash, Tab, Encoding), Sort, (Un)Tag, Clipboard, Internet, (Minify, traceur, sass, compass), Text Replace, Extrators, JSLint Global, JsDoc. Text Transforms(Reverse, UpperCase, LowerCase, Capitalize, CamelCase, HtmlEncode, HtmlDecode, UrlEncode, Join, Split, Number, Trim Leading, Trim Trailing, Sort Ascending, Sort Descending, Remove Duplicates, Remove Empty Lines, Unix To Win, Win To Unix, Single Quote To Double, Double To Single Quote, Toggle Quote, Single Slash To Double, Double To Single Slash, rgb-hex, Markdown Trim Trailing, Function JSDoc, Tag, Untag, Numbering).Clipboard(Copy Filename, Copy Fullname, Regnize, ExtratortoIX, Html Report).ReplacetoIX(Replace including Words only, Selection only, Multiline, Regnize, History).Internet Search(Open Url, Web Search, Browse File).Compiler(scss, js6 [ECMAScript 6], compass)
Notes 1.0.9 Easily add and manage notes.
Extract for Brackets (Preview) 0.7.2-1724-release Preview of Extract functionality inside Brackets. Extract design information and assets from a design comp via contextual code hints for CSS.
Brackets Font 0.4.5 This extensions displays Svg, TrueType, OpenType and WOFF fonts. See “More info…” for dependencies.
Ariane 1.1.1 Ariane, a beautiful purple theme for Brackets
XQuery 1.1.0 XQuery language support and syntax highlighting.
Solarized Dark 1.1.0 Solarized Dark theme
Insert Copyright 1.0.3 A Brackets extension to insert a copyright notice at the top of your documents (Hotkey: Alt+C)
Http Server for Brackets 1.0.7 Launches an http-server module (http://127.0.0.1:8989) at project root and opens the selected file in a new browser tab. NEW: bug-fixes
Theme / Spring Light 0.8.2 A light theme with natural, fresh and readable palette. Best for PHP, JS, CSS

Welcome to This Week’s Brackets Extension Updates, Issue 15/20.

Added or updated @Brackets extensions in the week from 05/04/2015 to 05/11/2015.

Last week there were 1 new Extension and 17 updates. This includes themes and other extensions.

What’s going on?

I’m late, late, late and still catching up with the previous weeks. Too much things going on at the same time. New projects and maintenance of old projects :-)

Find an overview of themes that moved up and down the list.

Rank # Name Downloads Previous Week

2 Quick Dark 1995 #1 ⇓
3 Ant Theme 970 ☼
4 Quick Light 857 #3 ⇓

8 Brackets Pryme Theme 484 ☼
9 Flat Attack Dark 434 #6 ⇓
10 Earth 411 #5 ⇓
11 Eclipse Theme Light 339 ⇔

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Neptune 1.0.0 Take your code to another world.

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Display Shortcuts 1.3.4 Display current shortcuts in a bottom panel that can be sorted and filtered. Add and disable shortcuts from context menu.
Autoprefixer 0.6.0 Parse CSS and add vendor prefixes automatically.
Brackets Builder 0.0.5 Allow to run build programs (such as running Python/Ruby/Node/etc scripts) from Brackets and display results in panel. It is possible to create own build systems via ‘Edit>Edit Builder’ menu item and editing opened JSON-file (you need to restart Brackets). Press Ctrl(Cmd)-B to build current file.
Cardboard 0.4.0 Manage packages/dependencies for your project.
White Space Sanitizer 1.1.1 Bring sanity to your white spaces and tabs leveraging Brackets settings
Monokai Dark Soda 1.0.6 Dark theme based on Dark Soda and Monokai color schemes.
Ant Theme 1.0.6 Dark color theme meant to be easy on the eyes
Quick Dark 1.1.3 A dark theme (based on Easy Dark) that makes your code pretty and readable.
Quick Light 1.1.3 A light theme that makes your code pretty and readable.
Projects 0.1.7 Open your projects from handy modal dialog. Really helpful if you have a lot of projects.
CoffeeScript 1.1.7 Improves syntax highlighting for CoffeeScript and CJSX.
Show Recently Used Items 0.5.7 Add a menu at the top of the editor with a list of all the files shown recently
Brackets Additional Right Click Menu 0.5.1 A Brackets extension that add additional functionality to Brackets editor right menu, like cut, copy, paste, select all, Camel Case, UPPERCASE, lowercase, fix indentation and some functionality from edit menu. changelog: added a shortcuts to some menu items, Fixed some bugs with brackets 1.3 paste, added fix indentation, bug fix for uppercase, lowercase and camelcase selection behaviour and change it’s short cut key
Tab Out 1.0.2 Use the Tab key to jump out of nested elements surrounded by characters “, ‘, ), ] or } like in Eclipse.
Vintage Terminal Effect 1.1.0 Enhance your editor area with visual effects of Vintage Terminal. Supporting any dark theme for Brackets.
Select Word 1.0.1 Select the word at the current cursor postion like if you double-click there.
Brackets Script Builder 0.0.8 Allows to run programs contained in one file (can be used for Scala, Java, Python, Ruby, Node, C++, Bash) from Brackets and display results in panel.
It is possible to create own build systems via ‘Edit > Script Builder Configuration’ menu item and editing opened JSON file (you need to restart Brackets afterwards).
Based on Brackets Builder (http://github.com/Vhornets/brackets-builder).

Keyboard shortcuts:
F9 to run current file as a script.
 F10 to compile current file.
* F11 to run compilation result.

New Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Terere 0.1.0 This terere is a theme for Brackets!

Updated Extensions

Name Version Description Download
Code Folding 0.3.5 Brackets extension that provides simple code folding for files edited in brackets. Supports brace folding, tag folding, indent folding and multi-line comment folding
SCSS Lint 0.2.0 Adds SCSS lint support to Brackets.
ESLint 0.17.3 Ignore version error and use ‘brackets-npm-registry’ to install.
File Tree Exclude 0.5.3 Excludes folders from the Brackets file system to avoid the 30,000 file limit. This is an updated version of Glenn Ruehle’s now defunkt plugin.
Simple Theme 1.1.0 Simple Light theme for Brackets.
Run Script 0.6.1 Use it to run a selected/all text from opened document as JS inside brackets without opening developer tools. Usefull if you developing a brackets extension or just to try/test your script inside brackets. Especially if you have extension like console plus (https://github.com/sixertoy/brackets-console-plus), so you don’t have to open developer console at all. Now with Python, Ruby, Perl and PHP supports (you must have Python, Ruby and PHP in your system and already set Python, Ruby, Perl and PHP path)!!! Please read more info for Python, Ruby, Perl and PHP support, etc. Use F9 shortcut for running script (run by looking at file extension/language)
Flat Attack Dark 1.0.5 Dark theme using flat colors for Brackets.
Brackets DB Manager 0.1.2 A brackets extension to querying a database server, now only support SQL server, other database will follow. Now it’s only offer basic functionality, like browse databases, tables, show table fields, show table data in a paging table, run query. Changelog on this update: database views, bug fix for table paging, etc. Please click read more to learn how to use it. Thanks
truedesign Subtle Light 1.2.0 Color Friendly
Brackets WordPress Functions Hints 1.0.1 Brackets WordPress Functions Hints - Provides code hints for function for the WordPress Themes and/or Plugins.
Brackets WordPress Hooks Hints 1.0.1 Brackets WordPress Hooks Hints - Provides code hints for hook for the WordPress Themes and/or Plugins.
CoffeeLint 1.9.6 Ignore version error and use ‘brackets-npm-registry’ to install.
